member.name: P:IZ.WebFileManager.RootDirectory.ExpandDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of levels that are expanded in the folder tree when a FileManager control is displayed for the first time.
member.value: The depth to display in the folder tree when the FileManager is initially displayed. The default is -1, which displays all the nodes.

member.name: P:IZ.WebFileManager.RootDirectory.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the node in the folder tree of FileManager control.
